Stockfighter¶

Suggestions¶

Documentation of JSON responses can be found in the linked Stockfighter docs.

If participating in a level with a single venue and symbol, it may be beneficial to use functools to simplify the order placement, status checking, and other functions.

sf = Stockfighter(API_KEY, 'TEST_ACCT')
order = functools.partial(sf.order, 'VENUE', 'SYMBOL')

Docs¶

class stockfighter.Stockfighter(api_key, account=None)¶

Class for interfacing with the Stockfighter.io API.

Parameters:
  • api_key – string containing private key
  • account – optional account string
cancel_order(venue, symbol, order_id)¶

Cancels a given order.

Parameters:
  • venue – str
  • symbol – str
  • order_id – int
Return type:

JSON https://starfighter.readme.io/docs/cancel-an-order
heartbeat()¶

Pings Stockfighter.io API to verify it is up.

Return type:bool
order(venue, symbol, side, quantity, ordertype, price=None)¶

Sends an order to the selected venue. Converts the price to an int.

Parameters:
  • venue – str
  • symbol – str
  • side – str
  • price – float
  • quantity – int
  • ordertype – str
Return type:

JSON https://starfighter.readme.io/docs/place-new-order
order_status(venue, symbol, order_id)¶

Check an order status.

Parameters:
  • venue – str
  • symbol – str
  • order_id – int
Return type:

JSON https://starfighter.readme.io/docs/status-for-an-existing-order
orderbook(venue, symbol)¶

Returns the order book available for a venue and symbol.

Parameters:
  • venue – str
  • symbol – str
Return type:

JSON https://starfighter.readme.io/docs/get-orderbook-for-stock
quote(venue, symbol)¶

Fetches quote for a symbol, venue.

Parameters:
  • venue – str
  • symbol – str
Return type:

JSON https://starfighter.readme.io/docs/a-quote-for-a-stock
stocks(venue)¶

Retrieve the list of stocks available for trading on a venue. Note this method only returns the tickers.

Parameters:venue – str
Return type:list(str)
venue_heartbeat(venue)¶

Pings a venue to verify it is up.

Return type:bool
